Dictionary.Name: The Free On-line Dictionary of Computing (27 SEP 03)

Definition.WordDefinition:
INTERCOM
<language> The {assembly language} for the {G-15}.
Versions: INTERCOM 101, INTERCOM 1000.
[Listed in CACM 2(5):16, May 1959].
(1997-07-23)
intercom n : a communication system linking different rooms within a building or ship etc [syn: {intercommunication system}]
